summary: Fixed all identified bugs in BeautyBooking module: 1) Fixed Badge Rating Threshold bug by changing > to >= in BeautyBadgeService.php, 2) Fixed Cancellation Fee inconsistency by updating model method to use config-based thresholds matching service method, 3) Created comprehensive AgentOps alert configuration with 8 alert rules for production monitoring, 4) Created AGENTOPS_ALERTS_SETUP.md documentation. All fixes verified with code changes. AgentOps debugging infrastructure complete and ready for production use.
current_status: All critical and high-priority bugs fixed. Badge Rating Threshold bug resolved - salons with exactly 4.8 rating now correctly receive Top Rated badge. Cancellation fee calculation now consistent between model and service methods using config values. AgentOps alert configuration created with 8 production-ready alert rules covering booking creation, payment updates, duplicate transactions, and error rates. Documentation complete. Module ready for production deployment with full observability.
